record.jsxtip: fired by click or equivalent event

record.jsxtext: the jsx3.gui.Event instance, will be null if this event is invoked with doShowStack()

record.jsxtip: fired whever this stack becomes visible within the parent stack group
fires when the item has just been removed from the DOM

record.jsxtext: JSX Object that is in the process of being destroyed
the parent of this JSX Object before it was removed from the DOM tree
